SELECT max("percent.system")+max("percent.user")+max("percent.interrupt") FROM "0" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("percent.system")+ max("percent.user")+ max("percent.interrupt") FROM "1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("if_octets.tx") FROM "default"."vmx0" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.active" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("c")+ last("p")+ last("dbuf_size")+ last("dnode_size")+ last("hdr_size")+ last("metadata_size")+ last("mfu_ghost_size")+ last("mfu_size")+ last("mru_ghost_size")+ last("mru_size") FROM "cache_size" WHERE ("resource" = 'zfs_arc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
